title: Drawing, "Design for a Stomacher", 1725–50
medium:
Brush, brown and black inks, green, rose, pale yellow, goauche, traces of graphite
Support: off-white laid paper
markings: Stamps: Verso: Museum for the Arts of Decoration Cooper Union
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli, Rome; Mr. and Mrs. Edward Brandegee, Boston
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Stomacher", 1725–50.
1725–50. Brush, brown and black inks, green, rose, pale yellow, goauche, traces of graphite
Support: off-white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-993.
